Package index

Board objects

Blocks

Data analysis pipelines are decomposed into steps, each represented by a block.

new_block() is_block() as_block() blocks() is_blocks() as_blocks()
Blocks
block_name() `block_name<-`() validate_data_inputs() block_inputs() block_arity()
Block utilities
block_server() expr_server() block_eval() block_eval_trigger() block_render_trigger()
Block server
block_ui() expr_ui() block_output()
Block UI
register_block() list_blocks() unregister_blocks() register_blocks() available_blocks() create_block()
Block registry

Links

Board links
